Step 1.Planning: Take the bowl out of the electric refrigerator

Step 2.Planning: Take the mussels out of the bowl

Step 3.Planning: Clean the mussels in the sink

Step 4.Planning: Dry the mussels with a paper towel

Step 5.Planning: Remove the sand from the mussels

Step 6.Planning: Put the cleaned mussels back into the bowl

Step 7.Planning: Dispose of the paper towel in the trash
